name: girlishness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
behaviour or characteristics that are considered typical of a girl: She is charming in her girlishness. Her strong, expressive face also retains a girlishness. See
girlish
More examplesFewer examplesDoris was so overcome with girlishness she actually giggled.What sets her apart is her girlishness and her maturity mixed in one.Ms. Stritch has always retained an odd air of girlishness.
